codeSystems.description: NPU codes for Basic Observations usable in Denmark

codeSystems.description: SNOMED CT codes for Basic Observations usable in Denmark

codeSystems.description: UCUM codes to represent units for basic Observations usable in Denmark

codeSystems.name: DkCoreEncounterPriority
codeSystems.title: DK priority codes for encounters
codeSystems.description: Value set used for indicating priority of an encounter

codeSystems.name: SorPracticeSettingCode
codeSystems.title: DK SOR Practice Setting Code
codeSystems.description: Values used for the document metadata attribute practiceSettingCode, which is an attribute specifying the clinical specialty where the act that resulted in the document was performed (e.g., Family Practice, Laboratory, Radiology). The value set is based on a subset of the code list from the SOR lookup table 'SOR-Kliniske specialer' (https://sor.sum.dsdn.dk/lookupdata/#clinical_speciality, accessable on Sundhedsdatanettet (SDN)), which is based on SNOMED CT codes.

codeSystems.name: DkCoreServiceRequestCodes
codeSystems.title: DK codes for ServiceRequest
codeSystems.description: Value set used to describe Danish healthcare services

codeSystems.title: DK MaritalStatus
codeSystems.description: This value set defines the set of codes that can be used to indicate the marital status of a person in Denmark.

codeSystems.name: SorOrganizationType
codeSystems.title: DK SOR Organization Type
codeSystems.description: Value set used for indicating the organization type for organizations from SOR
